objects.description: [SPACEHOP Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0052) has enabled the exploitation of CVE-2022-27518 and CVE-2022-27518 for illegitimate access.(Citation: NSA APT5 Citrix Threat Hunting December 2022)(Citation: ORB Mandiant)
